text: Gorkha National Liberation Front (GNLF) is a political party in the Darjeeling District of West Bengal, Republic of India. It was formed in 1980 by Subhash Ghisingh with the objective of demanding a Gorkhaland state within India. ==References== Category:1980 establishments in Asia Category:1980s establishments in India Category:Political parties in India
title: Gorkha National Liberation Front
